overview: Shot on location in Germany and set in a pre-World War II abandoned electrical plant on the outskirts of Berlin, Kollide stars Rascal Exclusives Eddie Stone, Jan Fischer, Johnny Hazzard, Tristan Bennet and a cast of international studs from all over the world. Have you ever dreamed of a place that exists where men can go to release their wildest exhibitionist fantasies? Kollide is where you can find just that place. Horny militant studs enter the premises of this compound and soon find themselves in the midst of some wild unabashed sex games. Follow the hot and nasty exploits of these international studs as they search for the ultimate hook-up. You won`t believe your eyes when you see the shameless situations these men get themselves into, cruising the grounds inside the plant.
title: Köllide
